descriptions.productName: Grill Mark  Stainless Steel  Brown  Grill Brush  1 Pc.
descriptions.description:
Clean between your grids with ease. The Y-shaped heads fit between and around grids for a more thorough cleaning. Stainless steel bristles with a wooden handle.     
 - Comfort grip handles  
 - Can be cleaned with warm, soapy water  
 - Leather loop to hang the brush from a grill hook for easy storage
descriptions.slug: grill mark  stainless steel  brown  grill brush  1 pc.

title.titleName: Ziploc Flexible 10.9 in. H x 16 in. W x 13 in. D Storage Tote

descriptions.productName: Ziploc  Flexible  10.9 In. H X 16 In. W X 13 In. D Storage Tote
descriptions.description:
10 gallon. Soft sided rectangular cube. Constructed of flexible and durable 6 mil thick plastic. Easy carry handles and easy-to-close zipper. Protects contents from dust, dirt, moisture, and pests. More versatile than rigid bins so they can fit in tight spaces in and around the house. Perfect for transporting items in the car, truck, RV, and boats.     
 - Heavy-duty plastic protects contents

title.titleName: Pet Lodge Steel Cage Clips Silver 8 in. H x .5 in. W x 2 in. D

descriptions.productName: Pet Lodge  Steel  Cage Clips  Silver  8 In. H X .5 In. W X 2 In. D
descriptions.description: These handy metal clips are designed for assembling or repairing 14 to 16 gauge wire panels for rabbit hutches, pet homes and other wire products. The ferrule-type clips wrap around wire or other material to fasten it together. Great for many uses around the farm, home and shop. One lbs. package contains enough clips to assemble three to four average-size wire units. For easy installation, use with the Pet Lodge wire clip pliers.
descriptions.slug: pet lodge  steel  cage clips  silver  8 in. h x .5 in. w x 2 in. d

title.titleName: DAP Gray Silicone Concrete and Masonry Filler and Sealant 10.1 oz.

descriptions.productName: Dap  Gray  Silicone  Concrete And Masonry  Filler And Sealant  10.1 Oz.
descriptions.description: High performance, latex-based sealant formulated to repair cracks and holes in concrete, mortar, and masonry. Contains silicone additives for improved adhesion and water resistance. Forms a durable, flexible and watertight seal. Resists gas, oil, grease and salt. Interior/exterior use. Paintable. Easy water clean-up.
descriptions.slug: dap  gray  silicone  concrete and masonry  filler and sealant  10.1 oz.

title.titleName: Old English No Scent Scratch Cover Polish Dark Wood 8 oz. Liquid

descriptions.productName: Old English  No Scent Scratch Cover Polish Dark Wood  8 Oz. Liquid
descriptions.description: Wood scratch repair is made easy with Old English scratch cover. The polish hides unsightly nicks and scratches - restoring the look of your wood furniture and bringing out wood's natural beauty. It is available in two colors to seamlessly match the color of your wood. For dark woods like mahogany and cherry use Old English scratch cover for dark woods. For medium to light woods like pine and oak use Old English scratch cover for light woods.
descriptions.slug: old english  no scent scratch cover polish dark wood  8 oz. liquid

title.titleName: Savogran Dirtex No Scent All Purpose Cleaner Liquid 18 oz.

descriptions.productName: Savogran  Dirtex  No Scent All Purpose Cleaner  Liquid  18 Oz.
descriptions.description: The No. 1 rated extra strength ammoniated spray cleaner for cleaning many surfaces around the home or office. Excellent for glass, chrome, porcelain, ceramic tile, appliance enamels. Removes dirt, grease and grime with just a wipe and also removes latex paint overspray (not recommended for shellac or lacquer). Spray Dirtex has a pleasant odor and contains no fluorocarbons
descriptions.slug: savogran  dirtex  no scent all purpose cleaner  liquid  18 oz.

descriptions.description: Built for versatility, the Intex Pull-Out Chair is designed for relaxing just about anywhere, whether you are at home. Watch TV, read a book, or just relax in the velvety soft chair and then pull out the cushion into a twin size air mattress when you are ready to go to sleep. Inflates and is ready to go in minutes!

Have a boat race with friends or leisurely cruise around the pool on lazy summer days. This Explorer 200, 2-Person inflatable boat features a grab rope, oar locks and soft inflatable floor for easy cruising. Set comes complete with 48in Deluxe Aluminum Oars and a Mini Hand Pump.
